id.description: Unique identifier for the video job.

object.description: The object type, which is always `video`.

model.description: The video generation model that produced the job.

status.description: Current lifecycle status of the video job.

progress.description: Approximate completion percentage for the generation task.

created_at.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) for when the job was created.

anyOf.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) for when the job completed, if finished.
Unix timestamp (seconds) for when the downloadable assets expire, if set.
The prompt that was used to generate the video.

size.description: The resolution of the generated video.

seconds.description: Duration of the generated clip in seconds.

anyOf.description: Identifier of the source video if this video is a remix.
Error payload that explains why generation failed, if applicable.

title: Video job
description: Structured information describing a generated video job.
